Description:
Light-Filled & Free-Flowing Village Victorian
Beautifully balancing period and modern styles in a quiet village street, this attractive Victorian reveals a superbly designed interior delivering light and flow from classic facade to fabulous courtyard garden. 'Dowra' is a delightful Hawthorn brick terrace of impressive proportions introduced by arched hallway and two bedroom layout that opens up to a large living and dining zone capturing glorious leafy aspects through a brilliant rear window wall. Perfect for indoor-outdoor entertaining, this inviting home includes kitchen with Blanco/Bosch appliances, bright spa bathroom with ensuite access, laundry area, central heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, polished hardwood floors, OFPs, attic storage and rear laneway access. Conveniently set near Darling Gardens, train station, shopping, cafes and schools.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128
Insights: 44 Myrtle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
ASPIRATIONAL INNER-CITY LIFESTYLE
One of Melbourne's most exclusive city-edge neighbourhoods finds this architect-designed warehouse conversion with its spacious two-level design, deluxe features and immediate access to everything that counts. Designer interior boasts two double bedrooms (both with robes), stylish ensuite and main bathroom, light-filled open living/dining area complemented by a granite-bench kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Add to this split-system heating and cooling, study alcove, European laundry and under-stair storage space, full-width terrace with leafy outlook, plus secure front courtyard (with second entry) and undercover parking space on title. Ideal for professionals and high-end investors, moments from village cafes and Clifton Hill Station, stroll to Mayors Park and Darling Gardens, easy access to Spensley Street Primary School, Queens Parade trams and Merri Creek trails. Perfect!
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Style surprise at the heart of the village
Superb quality with outstanding inner-city convenience defines the highly-coveted lifestyle appeal of this light-filled apartment. Completely renovated with confidence and class, this peaceful first-floor home bathing in natural light offers a stylish, single-level layout perfect for contemporary low-maintenance living. Shops, cafes, train station and Merri Creek parkland/trails are merely seconds away in such a central village location. This brilliant apartment includes entrance hallway, 2 sizable bedrooms with fitted built-in robes, smart living/dining room, excellent granite kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, immaculate modern bathroom, laundry area, separate WC, panel heating, fine carpets, plantation shutters and off-street parking.
Insights: 4/96 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Village Victorian with 3 bedroom floorplan and city views
Ideally located in the Clifton Hill village central to a host of inner-city lifestyle attractions, the wide elegant façade of this outstanding 3 bedroom Victorian reveals stylish contemporary enhancement, sun-filled entertainers' garden and fabulous city skyline views. Charming originality merges with modern style for easy living in this delightful terrace moments to Darling Gardens and Yarra parklands, cafes, shopping, schools, train station & eastern freeway. Includes arched hallway, living room, bright meals area with pebble gas heater, kitchen with Ilve/ASKO appliances, large bathroom with separate bath, laundry, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, Nobo heating, OFPs, alarm, polished concrete and Baltic pine floors, classical ceilings, BIRs, private alfresco entertainment deck, additional side entry to home and rear ROW.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Converted Former Boot Factory and Butcher Shop in the heart of Clifton Hill
From former Boot Factory and Butcher Shop, to sensational modern home, located in a prime corner position close to Queens Parade, Smith Street and Gold Street Primary School, this cutting edge conversion, streaming with light, offers a complete contemporary residence while retaining many original features. This fully renovated home comprises 3 bedrooms (main with ensuite), separate studio, spacious living and dining rooms, modern galley kitchen, with timber benchtops, overlooking a private established courtyard garden with prized off street parking, and Artist's studio. Also features polished timber floors, modern central tiled bathroom, gas log fire, extensive storage, split-system air conditioning and hydronic heating. Stroll to the trams on Smith Street, the Fitzroy Pool and the Darling Gardens.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautifully refurbished block
This upper level apartment offers an impressively stylish and secure lifestyle/investment opportunity far above any apartment you're likely to see for a long time. Featuring new blinds, carpet and paintwork, the apartment's pristine interior comprises one double bedroom (with built-in robes), updated ensuite bathroom with laundry facilities, open lounge/meals area and stylish kitchen with breakfast bar. Also features intercom with secure entry and access to the delightful adjoining common courtyard. An exclusive location surrounded by parkland, it's also close to Clifton Hill Station, Queens Parade trams, shops and cafes. Move in or rent it out - it's up to you.
Agent - hockingstuart
Nigel Harry : 0412 464 116

Description:
Stylish & Single-Level in a Premier Parklands Position
An exceptional street presence in a highly-coveted cul-de-sac reveals the stylish interior and secluded entertainers garden of this attractive 1920s residence with prized off-street parking. Moments to hectares of Merri Creek/Yarra River parklands, trails, Quarries Park adventure playground, schools, cafes and train station; you'll quickly fall in love with the lifestyle location and the easy modern living of this smart single-storey home. Complemented by evaporative cooling, central heating, plantation shutters and polished floorboards, this captivating home includes three double bedrooms with built-in-robes, north-facing living area, dining area opening to alfresco terrace, fully-appointed kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, stunning bathroom with clawfoot bath, European laundry and workshop.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Light & Airy 2-Level Entertainer Opposite Parklands
Immediately overlooking parkland opposite, which extends endlessly along tranquil river trails, an architect-designed renovation has created a unique quality of space lavishing this unexpectedly large 2-level residence with glorious natural light. Flexible and functional flowing to landscaped alfresco areas including entertainers' garden with self-cleaning heated pool; this outstanding free-standing Edwardian with park views follows a zoned 3 bedroom layout featuring fitted downstairs main with ensuite (WIR's) and huge upstairs 2nd (offering scope to divide). An idyllic setting near schools, Clifton Hill station, cafes and shopping, this exceptional home comprises spacious living and dining areas, study nook, fully-appointed kitchen, 2 bathrooms, powder room, laundry, hydronic heating, air-conditioning, alarm, polished floorboards, balcony, lined attic, rainwater tank and auto irrigation.
Insights: 4 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Executive Living... Prime location...
The devil is in the detail with this captivating renovation.
Victorian charm blends with contemporary design and luxury finishes to create this indulgent inner city oasis.
- 3 good size bedrooms with BIRs and OFPs
- Arched entrance hall
- 2 beautiful bathrooms (Ensuite from master)
- Generous living and adjoining dining overlooking private courtyard with spa
- Entertainers kitchen with European appliances
- High ceilings throughout, heating /cooling, laundry
- Land 6 x 27m approx. (rear access)
Walk to Clifton Hill rail station, Merri Creek, Walker Reserve, Darling Gardens, endless bike and walking paths and Queens Parade shops.

Description:
AUTHENTIC COTTAGE APPEAL, VERSATILE SPACES
'Fairford Cottage', full of warmth and character, is a Clifton Hill original. In the heart of the Village, close to the station, cafes and parks, this light-filled residence offers comfortable living with scope for further improvement. A flexible floorplan includes an impressive main bedroom/retreat, second double bedroom, sunny living/dining room open to solid timber kitchen (granite benchtops, quality appliances), period-style bathroom (bath and shower), laundry/utility and powder room. Including a secluded decked courtyard and side storage area, this inviting home features ducted heating, polished Baltic floors, pressed metal ceilings and other period detail.
Insights: 51 Berry Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Secluded & Spacious at the Heart of the Village
Precisely what inner-city living is all about with its central village position, easy access to lifestyle amenities and emphasis on private enjoyment, this superb warehouse style residence is the perfect fit for all your needs and wants. Multiple alfresco areas, quality features and loads of stylish space designed around the original industrial framework create a fabulous setting to relax and enjoy the convenience of nearby cafes, shops, Darling Gardens, recreation centre and express trains into the city. This brilliant architect-designed home with secure basement parking includes 3 robed bedrooms (large main with ensuite, WIR and balcony), versatile lounge or home office overlooking secluded courtyard, open-plan living and dining area adjoining entertainment balcony, fully-appointed granite kitchen, 2 bathrooms, powder room, laundry, Jarrah floors, heating, cooling and ample storage.

Description:
Inspirational Family Entertainer, Idyllic Parkland Environs
A wonderful setting directly opposite parkland has inspired the brilliant architect's-own transformation of this stunning block-fronted Edwardian. An executive family entertainer fusing classical elegance and cutting-edge style, this compelling two-level residence incorporates refined design elements linking a superb indoor-outdoor lifestyle with the tranquil Merri Creek environment at the doorstep. Hydronic heating, air-conditioning and double-glazing complement a spacious, zoned layout featuring four bedrooms (built-in-robes; upstairs parents' retreat with luxury ensuite, walk-in-robe and rooftop terrace), stylish lounge and family living/dining rooms opening to private leafy entertainment deck, outstanding stone kitchen with Smeg appliances and pantry, two bathrooms, laundry, open fireplaces, attic storage, plantation shutters, beautiful timber floors, rainwater tank and remote-control off street parking. Moments to schools, cafes, shops and train station.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
GREAT START, TOP ADDRESS!
This attractive 1930s semi-detached residence promises comfortable living with excellent potential for further improvement and extension (STCA) in a prime central Village position, moments from station and cafes and close to Yarra parkland. With a north-east-facing garden and carport and abundant light, it comprises 2 double bedrooms, large updated kitchen/meals, neat 1960s bathroom, laundry and separate WC, and features classic period detail, split system air conditioning and gas heating. In a prized city-edge precinct, this appealing home awaits a brilliant future.

Spacious light-filled rooms, elegant finishes and a prized position close to Dight's Falls, transport and Brunswick Street place this stunning contemporary residence in a class of its own. Description:
Parkside living at Clifton View
Immaculate two bedroom apartment nestled on a beautiful tree lined street.
- 2 double bedrooms with built in robes.
- Ample storage in entrance hall.
- Bright and open living; onto generous kitchen and dining.
- Stainless steel appliances and gas cooking.
- Central bathroom with laundry and separate toilet.
- Plus separate shared laundry/storage.
- Secure lock up garage via remote.
- Sound proof storage/studio in rear of garage.
- OC fees approx. only $500 per quarter.
Burrowed away in blossoming Clifton Hill, this two bedroom apartment is a great first home or addition to your investment portfolio. Surrounded by Parklands, Yarra Bend driving range, Yarra river and beautiful walking/bike paths. Only minutes to local schools, shops, cafes and public transport. Just a stones throw from Melbournes bustling CBD.

Description:
Be over the Noone!
Beyond its grand facade, the front home in this boutique warehouse conversion offers a combination of stylish executive living with the convenience of a modern floorplan.
Pristine interior showcases three large bedrooms with robes (two with vaulted ceilings) and three stylish bathrooms, spacious lounge and dining area, quality kitchen with all Smeg appliances, as well as an attic-style studio, complete with a sun-drenched entertaining terrace.
Other highlights include being 1 of just 14 in this boutique block, heating/cooling, alarm and video intercom, stone benches/vanities, laundry, plus a internally accessed remote garage.
Superbly located to Dights Falls and Yarra River parks and walking distance to boathouses and Collingwood Children's Farm. Easy access to cafes, shops and public transport. Minutes from the city, this is your chance to enjoy low maintenance metropolitan living.

Description:
CBD FRINGE. FABULOUS INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY IN TRENDY CLIFTON HILL
The ultimate entry-level opportunity in a highly-coveted location; first-home buyers, renovators and investors get excited as this freestanding timber home will impress. Set on 200m2 (approx) this character-filled solid home is currently comfortable and offers breathtaking potential to create sublime indoor and outdoor spaces only meters to magnificent parks, delicious cafes, shops, vibrant pubs, train and trams. This appealing period home includes traditional hallway, two generous bedrooms, living/meals area, functional kitchen, tiled bathroom, separate laundry, gas space heating and paved garden courtyard. Includes approved Plans and Permits for two further bedrooms and second story. Currently rented at $500 per week.
Please feel free to contact Manuela 0409 914 777 for more information.
Insights: 70 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Size Surprise of Impressive Indoor-Outdoor Proportions
Leave all expectations behind, as everything about this attractive Hawthorn brick Victorian on 378m2 (approx.) will impress. Particularly wide front, exceptionally deep rear garden and huge interior proportions define the fantastic opportunity presented by this long-held and meticulously maintained family home merging heritage refinement and stylish enhancement in a great village setting near schools, cafes, shops, train station and Merri Creek parklands. This superb residence with potential to renovate/extend features broad arched hallway, 3 large bedrooms, spacious living room (gas log heater), Smeg/Bosch-equipped kitchen, casual dining area, stylish bathroom, laundry, marble OFP, high classical ceilings, polished floorboards, covered entertainment area and side access to rear off-street parking.
Insights: 65 O'Grady Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Address: 2/206 Alexandra Parade East Clifton Hill VIC 3068
Description:
Peaceful Easy-Living East-End Retreat
Accessed via Rutland Street at the quiet residential east-end of Alexandra Parade; outstanding recreational amenities from nearby Yarra Bend parklands and trails to inner-city cafes, shopping, Convent Arts Precinct and rapid train access to the MCG and CBD confirm the exceptional lifestyle convenience of this stylish modern townhouse. Opening to a secluded north-facing rear courtyard garden with entertainment deck, this delightful home is tucked away to the rear (1 of 3) enjoying a peaceful, private ambience, low-maintenance living and off-street parking. Includes 2 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, large living room, open-plan kitchen (European appliances) and dining area, bright bathroom, laundry, floor heating and reverse-cycle air-conditioning.

Description:
At The Rear Of The Block .... Top Floor
Away from the traffic noise but ideally situated walking distance from all amenities including the CBD express train this refurbished one bedroom apartment is light, airy and deceptively spacious.
The kitchen and bathroom have had some works undertaken and includes a laundry facility in the bathroom, with panoramic views across the district the apartment is securely leased until July 2016 at $275p.w
With a car space in the undercroft, security entry and contained within a well maintained complex this apartment is a great investment or could be your pied-a'-terre.

Description:
CLASSIC EDWARDIAN OPPOSITE THE DARLING GARDENS
The beautiful Darling Gardens at your doorstep, this charming Edwardian boasts superb period appeal, comfortable living areas and great inner-north lifestyle options. High ceilings, ornate cornices and exquisite stucco plasterwork showcase the traditions of yesteryear, from a spacious lounge with cosy fireplace to the bright open-plan kitchen/meals area, amplified by a lofty vaulted ceiling, timber benchtops and stainless-steel appliances, as double doors unfold to a sublime deck and leafy courtyard sanctuary. Three generous bedrooms (two BIRs) are complemented by a spotless bathroom with stone double vanity and laundry facilities, timber boards, ducted heating, split-system cooling and underfloor storage. Ideally placed to enjoy Queens Parade and Smith St cafes, restaurants and nightspots, plus close to schools and public transport.
Insights: 23 South Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
